Package com.linecorp.armeria.server.metric

Metric-collecting service decorators and exporters.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DropwizardMetricCollectingService<I extends Request,O extends Response>
    Decorates a Service to collect metrics into Dropwizard MetricRegistry.
    PrometheusExporterHttpService
    Exports Prometheus metrics.
    PrometheusMetricCollectingService<T extends MetricLabel<T>,I extends Request,O extends Response>
    Decorates a Service to collect metrics into Prometheus CollectorRegistry.
